Title: Vintage Elgin Pocket Watch - 15-Jewel, Open Face, 12-Size, CA1921
Description: Elgin (US) 15-Jewel Open Face 12-Size Pocket Watch Elgin; Man’s; Serial # 23,942,280; Circa: 1921 CASE: The yellow-gold-filled 12-size open face plain case is monogrammed. DIAL: This white porcelain single sunk dial displays Arabic numerals and spade hands. MOVT: The 15-jewel stem-set Grade 315 nickel movement features a lever escapement and a ¾-plate layout. COND: C 3-14 (The case is in very good condition, multiple dents) D 3-46 (very small) (The dial is in very good condition, chip(s) or hairline(s) under bezel, not visible when closed) M 3 (The movement is in very good condition) AI-SP92016-1 CUSTOMER SERVICE: Phone 1-800-424-5353 Contact: Rick Gilbert Hours:9 - 5 EST, Monday - Friday Address: eAshland_net Sarasota Arts & Antique Center 640 South Washington Blvd, Suite 200 Sarasota, FL 34236 INTERNATIONAL CUSTOMERS: Import duties, taxes and charges are not included in the item price or shipping charges.
